cooking-steps.1: Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken pieces until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes per side. Transfer chicken to a plate and set aside.
cooking-steps.2: In the same skillet, add onions and cook until translucent, about 2 minutes. Add garlic and cook for an additional minute until fragrant.
cooking-steps.3: Return the chicken to the skillet. Add soy sauce, vinegar, black pepper, and bay leaves. Stir to combine and bring to a boil.
cooking-steps.4: Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 30 to 40 minutes, or until chicken is tender and the sauce has thickened.
cooking-steps.5: Adjust seasoning with additional soy sauce or vinegar if needed. Serve hot with rice.

cooking-steps.1: In a pot, heat vegetable oil over medium heat. Add garlic, onions, and ginger, cooking until fragrant.
cooking-steps.2: Add chicken pieces and cook until lightly browned.
cooking-steps.3: Add rice and stir for a couple of minutes. Pour in chicken broth and fish sauce. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, or until rice is cooked and the mixture is thickened.
cooking-steps.4: Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot, garnished with green onions and crispy fried garlic.

cooking-steps.1: In a pot, combine pork belly, salt, pepper, bay leaves, garlic, and vinegar. Add enough water to cover the pork and bring to a boil.
cooking-steps.2: Reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour, or until pork is tender. Remove pork and let it cool.
cooking-steps.3: Once cooled, pat pork dry and deep-fry in hot oil until crispy and golden brown.
cooking-steps.4: Drain on paper towels and serve hot.

cooking-steps.1: Heat vegetable oil in a pan over medium heat. Add garlic and onions, and cook until softened.
cooking-steps.2: Add diced pork and cook until browned.
cooking-steps.3: Stir in shrimp paste and cook for another minute. Add coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
cooking-steps.4: Add chili peppers and cook for 10 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and pork is tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Marinate beef in soy sauce and lemon juice for at least 30 minutes.
cooking-steps.2: Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat. Sauté garlic and onions until softened.
cooking-steps.3: Add marinated beef and cook until browned. Pour in water and bring to a boil.
cooking-steps.4: Reduce heat and simmer until beef is tender and sauce has thickened. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.2: Add chicken and pork, and cook until browned.
cooking-steps.3: Add carrots, bell peppers, and cabbage. Stir-fry for a few minutes.
cooking-steps.4: Add soy sauce and water, and bring to a simmer. Stir in cornstarch mixture to thicken. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Marinate pork belly in soy sauce, calamansi juice, garlic, brown sugar, salt, and pepper for at least 2 hours.
cooking-steps.2: Preheat grill to medium-high heat and lightly oil the grates.
cooking-steps.3: Grill pork belly for 5-7 minutes per side, or until cooked through and slightly charred.
cooking-steps.4: Serve hot with steamed rice and your favorite dipping sauce.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.2: Add bagoong and cook for another minute.
cooking-steps.3: Add kangkong and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes, or until wilted.
cooking-steps.4: Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.

cooking-steps.1: In a pot, boil oxtail in water until tender. Remove and set aside.
cooking-steps.2: In a separate pan, heat oil and sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.3: Add peanut butter and coconut milk, stirring to combine. Return oxtail to the pan and simmer until well-coated with the sauce.
cooking-steps.4: Add vegetables and cook until tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with bagoong on the side.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic, onions, and pork until the pork is cooked through.
cooking-steps.2: Add shrimp paste and cook for another minute.
cooking-steps.3: Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
cooking-steps.4: Add dried taro leaves and chili peppers. Simmer until the leaves are tender and the sauce has thickened. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.2: Add diced lechon and cook until slightly browned.
cooking-steps.3: Stir in vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, and bay leaves. Add water and bring to a boil.
cooking-steps.4: Reduce heat and simmer for 20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the flavors are well combined. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.2: Add pork and cook until browned.
cooking-steps.3: Stir in tomato sauce and soy sauce, and add water. Bring to a boil.
cooking-steps.4: Add potatoes, carrots, and green peas. Simmer until vegetables are tender and sauce has thickened. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Cook pancit malabon noodles according to package instructions. Set aside.
cooking-steps.2: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.3: Add pork, shrimp, and squid. Cook until seafood is done.
cooking-steps.4: Add pancit malabon sauce and stir to combine. Add cooked noodles and toss to coat evenly. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a large pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.2: Add pork and chicken, and cook until browned.
cooking-steps.3: Add carrots, green beans, and cabbage. Stir-fry for a few minutes.
cooking-steps.4: Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, and water. Bring to a simmer. Add pancit canton noodles and cook until noodles are tender and the sauce is absorbed. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic, onions, and pork until the pork is browned.
cooking-steps.2: Add tomatoes and cook until softened.
cooking-steps.3: Add shrimp paste, bitter melon, eggplant, and string beans. Stir-fry for a few minutes.
cooking-steps.4: Add a little water if necessary. Simmer until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat. Sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.2: Add pork and cook until browned.
cooking-steps.3: Pour in coconut milk and bring to a simmer.
cooking-steps.4: Add string beans and eggplant. Simmer until vegetables are tender and the sauce has thickened. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Heat oil in a pot over medium heat. Sauté garlic and onions until fragrant.
cooking-steps.2: Add pork and chorizo, and cook until browned.
cooking-steps.3: Stir in tomato sauce and water, and bring to a boil.
cooking-steps.4: Add potatoes, carrots, and cabbage. Simmer until vegetables are tender and the sauce is thickened. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: In a pot, heat oil over medium heat. Sauté onions and tomatoes until softened.
cooking-steps.2: Add pork ribs and cook until browned.
cooking-steps.3: Pour in water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until pork is tender.
cooking-steps.4: Add tamarind paste, radish, and string beans. Cook until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: In a pot, heat oil over medium heat. Sauté onions and tomatoes until softened.
cooking-steps.2: Add fish pieces and cook until lightly browned.
cooking-steps.3: Pour in water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until fish is cooked through.
cooking-steps.4: Add tamarind paste, radish, and string beans. Cook until vegetables are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste.

cooking-steps.1: Marinate beef in soy sauce, brown sugar, and garlic for at least 1 hour.
cooking-steps.2: Heat oil in a pan over medium-high heat and cook beef until browned and cooked through.
cooking-steps.3: In the same pan, stir-fry cooked rice with a little oil and additional garlic.
cooking-steps.4: Fry an egg for each serving. Serve beef and garlic rice with a fried egg on top.
